ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

TIME_API_KEY.description: Get your API key from https://timezonedb.com/api

CHATBOT_API.description: Get your API key from @FallenChat_Bot using /token

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

START_IMG.description: Telegraph link of the image which will be shown at start command.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where your users will go and bother you with shit Example - The_support_chat.

TOKEN.description: Get bot token from @BotFather on TG
